external_games.name: YuYu Hakusho Dai-San-Dan: Makai no Tobira

name: YuYu Hakusho Dai-San-Dan: Makai no Tobira
summary: Makai no Tobira is the third Game Boy release in the YuYu Hakusho series. Unlike the other games in the series for the platform, it was a single-plane brawler with top-down sections.
